alert.note: Alert for Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 31 at 2:38PM CDT until May 31 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian, Dallas, Greene, Laclede, Lawrence, Polk and Webster. * WHEN...Until 630 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 238 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Four Mile Creek at Highway P, Wilson Creek at Farm Road 156, Sac River at County Road 1247, Clear Creek at Farm Road 87, Cabin Creek at Cabin Creek Road, Wilson Creek at Farm Road 146 and Givins Branch at Highway W. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northwestern Springfield, Republic, Battlefield, Willard, Ash Grove, Fair Grove, Conway, Brookline, Phillipsburg, Bennett Springs, Olive, Ebenezer, Elkland, Glidewell, Charity, Cave Springs, Long Lane, Bois D`arc, Windyville and Bennett Spring State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
